name: Koihime Enbu RyoRaiRai 恋姫†演武 ～遼来来～
description: Koihime Enbu RyoRaiRai is a comprehensive rebalance of the popular fighter Koihime Enbu, featuring 14 playable characters, with “Chōryō” and "assist" character “Kaku” joining their rivals on the battlefield for the first time!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 2GHz or faster processor Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 3000 DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectSound Additional Notes: Xbox 360 compatible controller recommended
